title: Condo Grade * Downtown Union Station 5 min LoHi Highlands Riverfront
posting_body: ['Welcome to Downtown Denvers BEST Property!', "Located in downtown Denver's Central Business District offering design-driven floor plans ranging in size from stylish studios to spacious penthouses.", 'Make the most of an ideal location and world-class residences that feature the finest finishes including granite countertops, solid wood cabinetry, wood-style flooring, and stainless steel appliances along with best-in-class community amenities like an 8th floor glass-sided sky pool and amenity deck, business center, and fitness studio, plus on-site grocery and parcel storage.', 'Unique Features', 'Alfresco Kitchen and BBQ Area', 'Business Center', 'Coffee Lounge', 'Cold Storage (Food Delivery)', 'Customizable Walk-in Closet', 'Decorative Light Fixtures', 'Dry Cleaning Service', 'E-bikes', 'Entertainment Kitchen', 'Exclusive Amenity Deck', 'Fire Pits', 'Game Room with Billards Table', 'Glass-Sided Pool and Spa with Skyline Views', 'Keyless Bluetooth Entry', 'Movement Studio', 'On-Site Parcel Storage', 'Outdoor Theatre', 'Pet Spa', 'Resident Lounge', 'Resident Storage', 'Slab Granite Countertops with Modern Backsplash', 'Social Spaces', 'Solid Wood Cabinetry', 'Call or TEXT ASAP for Fast Personal Showings!', 'RiNo, LoDo, LoHi, Highlands, SoBo, Capital Hill, Uptown, Cherry Creek, Five Points, Commons Park, DTC, Stapleton, Belmar, Lakewood, Wash Park, Riverfront Park, Union Station, Park Hill, Golden Triangle, CBD, Lincoln Park, Lowry Park, Aurora, Englewood, Westminster, Thornton, Boulder, Littleton, Greenwood Village and Virginia Village', '*Restrictions apply.', 'Pricing and availability subject to change without notice**']
